text: Boulting is an English language surname. It may refer to: *Crispian Boulting (born 1973), British musician *Ingrid Boulting (born 1947), American model and actress *John Boulting (1913–1985), British filmmaker *Ned Boulting (born 1969), British journalist *Roy Boulting (1913–2001), British filmmaker *Sydney Boulting (1912–1998), British filmmaker Category:Surnames Category:English- language surnames
